author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Correct bug for HFNose which made holes in layer 8. Also for all silicon wafers, the validity of DetId's is extended. Replace some of the cost statements with LogVerbatim

#### PR validation:

Tested with all the relevant Phase2 workflows

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No back porting is needed
title: Run4-hgx199 Correct bug for HFNose and extend validity check for silicon cells
